author: Z.B. Steele
description:
We got a chance to sit down with Anna Stephens, the author of the epic fantasy series Godblind and Songs of the Drowned. Read along as we talk about writing, Marvel, martial arts, and all things dark and depraved. [GdM] Hey Anna, thank you so much for doing this interview! To get things started, can […]

The post INTERVIEW: author Anna Stephens appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: INTERVIEW: author Anna Stephens
